sentence.Network_en: The movement synthesised elements of modern art that hadn't been brought together before, such as Cubism and Surrealism.
sentence.Network_cn: 该运动综合了立体派和超现实主义等以前从未同时出现过的现代艺术元素。

sentence.Network_en: His early work was influenced by the European surrealism of the 1930's.
sentence.Network_cn: 他早期的作品受到了20世纪30年代欧洲超现实主义的影响。

sentence.Network_en: The various groups had either stagnated, transferred loyalties , or merged into constructivism or surrealism.
sentence.Network_cn: 各种团体不是停止活动和转向, 就是加入构成主义或超现实主义.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: from French surréalisme (see sur-, realism)

entry.tran: (艺术、文学上的)超现实主义，超现实派
entry.def: Surrealism is a style in art and literature in which ideas, images, and objects are combined in a strange way, like in a dream.

example.ex: His early work was influenced by the European surrealism of the 1930's.
example.tran: 他早期的作品受到了20世纪30年代欧洲超现实主义的影响。

means.word_mean: 1. a 20th century movement of artists and writers (developing out of Dadaism) who used fantastic images and incongruous juxtapositions in order to represent unconscious thoughts and dreams

auth_sentence.content: I was always an admirer of Dada and Surrealism.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was always an admirer of Dada and Surrealism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was always an admirer of Dada and Surrealism.

auth_sentence.content: Surrealism aims to destroy by the denial of reason.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surrealism aims to destroy by the denial of reason.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surrealism aims to destroy by the denial of reason.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越
